tasks.task: Drive the tractor up the hill with the hay compartment and plow attached.
subtasks: Sit in the tractor seat.
Operate the steering wheel to navigate the hill.
Engage the tractor's transmission to move.
Secure the hay compartment and plow to the tractor.
Check the attachments are secure before moving.

tasks.task: Lower the plow to prepare for grading the field.
subtasks: Locate the plow control lever.
Move the plow control lever to lower the plow.
Verify the plow is fully extended and stable.

tasks.task: Guide the tractor along the field rows while operating the plow.
subtasks: Maintain straight path while driving.
Periodically check the plow angle or depth if needed.
Adjust the steering as necessary to stay on course.

tasks.task: Align the plow at the end of the field row for turning.
subtasks: Neutralize the tractor's transmission.
Use the plow to grade and direct dirt for turning.
Position the tractor for the next pass.

tasks.task: Secure the plow back to the tractor when done.
subtasks: Raise the plow control lever.
Check that the plow is stowed safely.
Attach any safety chains if needed.

tasks.task: Drive the tractor back down the hill.
subtasks: Adjust speed and traction for descending slope.
Use the brakes if necessary for safety.
Check that all attachments are properly connected.
Steer carefully down the hill to park the tractor.
